path.onmouseover: displayAnnotation(evt, 'YGL062W PYC1', 'Pyruvate carboxylase isoform, cytoplasmic enzyme that converts pyruvate to oxaloacetate; highly similar to isoform Pyc2p but differentially regulated; mutations in the human homolog are associated with lactic acidosis', new Array('1.24'), new Array('#FFB0B0'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YBR218C PYC2', 'Pyruvate carboxylase isoform, cytoplasmic enzyme that converts pyruvate to oxaloacetate; highly similar to isoform Pyc1p but differentially regulated; mutations in the human homolog are associated with lactic acidosis', new Array('1.23'), new Array('#FFB2B2'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YKL085W MDH1', 'Mitochondrial malate dehydrogenase, catalyzes interconversion of malate and oxaloacetate; involved in the tricarboxylic acid (TCA) cycle; phosphorylated', new Array('-1.07'), new Array('#E5FFE5'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YPL262W FUM1', 'Fumarase, converts fumaric acid to L-malic acid in the TCA cycle; cytosolic and mitochondrial distribution determined by the N-terminal targeting sequence, protein conformation, and status of glyoxylate shunt; phosphorylated in mitochondria', new Array('-1.09'), new Array('#DFFFDF'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YJL045W', 'Minor succinate dehydrogenase isozyme; homologous to Sdh1p, the major isozyme reponsible for the oxidation of succinate and transfer of electrons to ubiquinone; induced during the diauxic shift in a Cat8p-dependent manner', new Array('NA'), new Array('#999999'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YLL041C SDH2', 'Iron-sulfur protein subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (Sdh1p, Sdh2p, Sdh3p, Sdh4p), which couples the oxidation of succinate to the transfer of electrons to ubiquinone as part of the TCA cycle and the mitochondrial respiratory chain', new Array('1.21'), new Array('#FFBABA'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YKL141W SDH3', 'Cytochrome b subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (Sdh1p, Sdh2p, Sdh3p, Sdh4p), which couples the oxidation of succinate to the transfer of electrons to ubiquinone as part of the TCA cycle and the mitochondrial respiratory chain', new Array('-1.12'), new Array('#D5FFD5'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YDR178W SDH4', 'Membrane anchor subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (Sdh1p, Sdh2p, Sdh3p, Sdh4p), which couples the oxidation of succinate to the transfer of electrons to ubiquinone as part of the TCA cycle and the mitochondrial respiratory chain', new Array('1.03'), new Array('#FFF6F6'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YKL148C SDH1', 'Flavoprotein subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (Sdh1p, Sdh2p, Sdh3p, Sdh4p), which couples the oxidation of succinate to the transfer of electrons to ubiquinone as part of the TCA cycle and the mitochondrial respiratory chain', new Array('1.02'), new Array('#FFFAFA'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YLL041C SDH2', 'Iron-sulfur protein subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (Sdh1p, Sdh2p, Sdh3p, Sdh4p), which couples the oxidation of succinate to the transfer of electrons to ubiquinone as part of the TCA cycle and the mitochondrial respiratory chain', new Array('1.21'), new Array('#FFBABA'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YKL141W SDH3', 'Cytochrome b subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (Sdh1p, Sdh2p, Sdh3p, Sdh4p), which couples the oxidation of succinate to the transfer of electrons to ubiquinone as part of the TCA cycle and the mitochondrial respiratory chain', new Array('-1.12'), new Array('#D5FFD5'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YDR178W SDH4', 'Membrane anchor subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (Sdh1p, Sdh2p, Sdh3p, Sdh4p), which couples the oxidation of succinate to the transfer of electrons to ubiquinone as part of the TCA cycle and the mitochondrial respiratory chain', new Array('1.03'), new Array('#FFF6F6'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YGR244C LSC2', 'Beta subunit of succinyl-CoA ligase, which is a mitochondrial enzyme of the TCA cycle that catalyzes the nucleotide-dependent conversion of succinyl-CoA to succinate', new Array('1.09'), new Array('#FFDEDE'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YOR142W LSC1', 'Alpha subunit of succinyl-CoA ligase, which is a mitochondrial enzyme of the TCA cycle that catalyzes the nucleotide-dependent conversion of succinyl-CoA to succinate; phosphorylated', new Array('1.11'), new Array('#FFD9D9'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YDR148C KGD2', 'Dihydrolipoyl transsuccinylase, component of the mitochondrial alpha-ketoglutarate dehydrogenase complex, which catalyzes the oxidative decarboxylation of alpha-ketoglutarate to succinyl-CoA in the TCA cycle; phosphorylated', new Array('NA'), new Array('#999999'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YIL125W KGD1', 'Component of the mitochondrial alpha-ketoglutarate dehydrogenase complex, which catalyzes a key step in the tricarboxylic acid (TCA) cycle, the oxidative decarboxylation of alpha-ketoglutarate to form succinyl-CoA', new Array('NA'), new Array('#999999'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YFL018C LPD1', 'Dihydrolipoamide dehydrogenase, the lipoamide dehydrogenase component (E3) of the pyruvate dehydrogenase and 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase multi-enzyme complexes', new Array('-1.02'), new Array('#F8FFF8'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YOR136W IDH2', 'Subunit of mitochondrial NAD(+)-dependent isocitrate dehydrogenase, which catalyzes the oxidation of isocitrate to alpha-ketoglutarate in the TCA cycle; phosphorylated', new Array('1.06'), new Array('#FFE8E8'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YLR304C ACO1', 'Aconitase, required for the tricarboxylic acid (TCA) cycle and also independently required for mitochondrial genome maintenance; phosphorylated; component of the mitochondrial nucleoid; mutation leads to glutamate auxotrophy', new Array('1.03'), new Array('#FFF3F3'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YLR304C ACO1', 'Aconitase, required for the tricarboxylic acid (TCA) cycle and also independently required for mitochondrial genome maintenance; phosphorylated; component of the mitochondrial nucleoid; mutation leads to glutamate auxotrophy', new Array('1.03'), new Array('#FFF3F3'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YJL200C ACO2', 'Putative mitochondrial aconitase isozyme; similarity to Aco1p, an aconitase required for the TCA cycle; expression induced during growth on glucose, by amino acid starvation via Gcn4p, and repressed on ethanol', new Array('1.09'), new Array('#FFE0E0'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YPR001W CIT3', 'Dual specificity mitochondrial citrate and methylcitrate synthase; catalyzes the condensation of acetyl-CoA and oxaloacetate to form citrate and that of propionyl-CoA and oxaloacetate to form 2-methylcitrate', new Array('NA'), new Array('#999999'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YNR001C CIT1', 'Citrate synthase, catalyzes the condensation of acetyl coenzyme A and oxaloacetate to form citrate; the rate-limiting enzyme of the TCA cycle; nuclear encoded mitochondrial protein', new Array('1.13'), new Array('#FFD3D3'))

displayAnnotation(evt, 'YNL037C IDH1', 'Subunit of mitochondrial NAD(+)-dependent isocitrate dehydrogenase, which catalyzes the oxidation of isocitrate to alpha-ketoglutarate in the TCA cycle', new Array('NA'), new Array('#999999'))
